methods.name: reactions.add
methods.description: Adds a reaction to an item.

params.name: token
params.description: Authentication token bearing required scopes. Tokens should be passed as an HTTP Authorization header or alternatively, as a POST parameter.

params.name: channel
params.description: Channel where the message to add reaction to was posted.

params.name: name
params.description: Reaction (emoji) name.

params.name: timestamp
params.description: Timestamp of the message to add reaction to.

errors.name: not_reactable
errors.description: Whatever you passed in, like a file or file_comment, can't be reacted to anymore. Your app can react to messages though.

errors.name: invalid_name
errors.description: Value passed for name was invalid.

errors.name: too_many_emoji
errors.description: The limit for distinct reactions (i.e emoji) on the item has been reached.

errors.name: message_not_found
errors.description: Message specified by channel and timestamp does not exist.

errors.name: already_reacted
errors.description: The specified item already has the user/reaction combination.

errors.name: bad_timestamp
errors.description: Value passed for timestamp was invalid.

errors.name: too_many_reactions
errors.description: The limit for reactions a person may add to the item has been reached.

errors.name: no_item_specified
errors.description: combination of channel and timestamp was not specified.

errors.name: is_archived
errors.description: Channel specified has been archived.

errors.name: channel_not_found
errors.description: Value passed for channel is invalid.

errors.name: external_channel_migrating
errors.description: The channel is in the process of being migrated.

errors.name: thread_locked
errors.description: Reactions are disabled as the specified message is part of a locked thread.

errors.name: not_authed
errors.description: No authentication token provided.

errors.name: invalid_auth
errors.description: Some aspect of authentication cannot be validated. Either the provided token is invalid or the request originates from an IP address disallowed from making the request.

errors.name: account_inactive
errors.description: Authentication token is for a deleted user or workspace when using a bot token.

errors.name: token_revoked
errors.description: Authentication token is for a deleted user or workspace or the app has been removed when using a user token.

errors.name: no_permission
errors.description: The workspace token used in this request does not have the permissions necessary to complete the request. Make sure your app is a member of the conversation it's attempting to post a message to.

errors.name: org_login_required
errors.description: The workspace is undergoing an enterprise migration and will not be available until migration is complete.

errors.name: ekm_access_denied
errors.description: Administrators have suspended the ability to post a message.

errors.name: missing_scope
errors.description: The token used is not granted the specific scope permissions required to complete this request.

errors.name: not_allowed_token_type
errors.description: The token type used in this request is not allowed.

errors.name: method_deprecated
errors.description: The method has been deprecated.

errors.name: deprecated_endpoint
errors.description: The endpoint has been deprecated.

errors.name: two_factor_setup_required
errors.description: Two factor setup is required.

errors.name: enterprise_is_restricted
errors.description: The method cannot be called from an Enterprise.

errors.name: team_access_not_granted
errors.description: The token used is not granted the specific workspace access required to complete this request.

errors.name: invalid_arguments
errors.description: The method was either called with invalid arguments or some detail about the arguments passed are invalid, which is more likely when using complex arguments like blocks or attachments.

errors.name: invalid_arg_name
errors.description: The method was passed an argument whose name falls outside the bounds of accepted or expected values. This includes very long names and names with non-alphanumeric characters other than _. If you get this error, it is typically an indication that you have made a very malformed API call.

errors.name: invalid_array_arg
errors.description: The method was passed an array as an argument. Please only input valid strings.

errors.name: invalid_charset
errors.description: The method was called via a POST request, but the charset specified in the Content-Type header was invalid. Valid charset names are: utf-8 iso-8859-1.

errors.name: invalid_form_data
errors.description: The method was called via a POST request with Content-Type application/x-www-form-urlencoded or multipart/form-data, but the form data was either missing or syntactically invalid.

errors.name: invalid_post_type
errors.description: The method was called via a POST request, but the specified Content-Type was invalid. Valid types are: application/json application/x-www-form-urlencoded multipart/form-data text/plain.

errors.name: missing_post_type
errors.description: The method was called via a POST request and included a data payload, but the request did not include a Content-Type header.

errors.name: team_added_to_org
errors.description: The workspace associated with your request is currently undergoing migration to an Enterprise Organization. Web API and other platform operations will be intermittently unavailable until the transition is complete.

errors.name: invalid_json [hidden]
errors.description: The method was called via a `POST` request with `Content-Type` `application/json`, but the body was not valid JSON.

errors.name: json_not_object [hidden]
errors.description: The method was called via a `POST` request a valid JSON body, but the JSON value was not an object.

errors.name: ratelimited
errors.description: The request has been ratelimited. Refer to the Retry-After header for when to retry the request.

errors.name: accesslimited
errors.description: Access to this method is limited on the current network

errors.name: request_timeout
errors.description: The method was called via a POST request, but the POST data was either missing or truncated.

errors.name: upgrade_required [hidden]
errors.description: The calling application needs to be upgraded.

errors.name: service_unavailable
errors.description: The service is temporarily unavailable

errors.name: fatal_error
errors.description: The server could not complete your operation(s) without encountering a catastrophic error. It's possible some aspect of the operation succeeded before the error was raised.

errors.name: internal_error
errors.description: The server could not complete your operation(s) without encountering an error, likely due to a transient issue on our end. It's possible some aspect of the operation succeeded before the error was raised.

params.name: token

params.name: file
params.description: File to get reactions for.

params.name: file_comment
params.description: File comment to get reactions for.

params.name: full
params.description: If true always return the complete reaction list.

params.name: timestamp
params.description: Timestamp of the message to get reactions for.

methods.name: reactions.list
methods.description: Lists reactions made by a user.

params.name: token
params.description: Authentication token bearing required scopes. Tokens should be passed as an HTTP Authorization header or alternatively, as a POST parameter.

params.name: count
params.description: Number of items to return per page.Default: 100

params.name: cursor
params.description: Parameter for pagination. Set cursor equal to the next_cursor attribute returned by the previous request's response_metadata. This parameter is optional, but pagination is mandatory: the default value simply fetches the first "page" of the collection. See pagination for more details.

params.name: full
params.description: If true always return the complete reaction list.

params.name: limit
params.description: The maximum number of items to return. Fewer than the requested number of items may be returned, even if the end of the list hasn't been reached.Default: 0

params.name: page
params.description: Page number of results to return.Default: 1

params.name: team_id
params.description: encoded team id to list reactions in, required if org token is used

params.name: user
params.description: Show reactions made by this user. Defaults to the authed user.

errors.name: user_not_found
errors.description: Value passed for user was invalid.

methods.name: reactions.remove
methods.description: Removes a reaction from an item.

params.name: token
params.description: Authentication token bearing required scopes. Tokens should be passed as an HTTP Authorization header or alternatively, as a POST parameter.

params.name: name
params.description: Reaction (emoji) name.

params.name: channel
params.description: Channel where the message to remove reaction from was posted.

params.name: file
params.description: File to remove reaction from.

params.name: file_comment
params.description: File comment to remove reaction from.

params.name: timestamp
params.description: Timestamp of the message to remove reaction from.

errors.name: bad_timestamp
errors.description: Value passed for timestamp was invalid.

errors.name: file_not_found
errors.description: File specified by file does not exist.

errors.name: file_comment_not_found
errors.description: File comment specified by file_comment does not exist.

errors.name: message_not_found
errors.description: Message specified by channel and timestamp does not exist.

errors.name: no_item_specified
errors.description: file, file_comment, or combination of channel and timestamp was not specified.

errors.name: invalid_name
errors.description: Value passed for name was invalid.

errors.name: no_reaction
errors.description: The specified item does not have the user/reaction combination.

errors.name: channel_not_found
errors.description: The specified channel was not found.

errors.name: external_channel_migrating
errors.description: The reaction is in a channel that is being migrated
